trans-unit.source: Install the PC client software | Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Install the PC client software | Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: Use this guide to help you get your Windows PCs managed by the Microsoft Intune client software.
trans-unit.target: Use this guide to help you get your Windows PCs managed by the Microsoft Intune client software.

trans-unit.source: Install the Intune software client on Windows PCs
trans-unit.target: Install the Intune software client on Windows PCs

trans-unit.source: Windows PCs can be enrolled by installing the Intune client software.
trans-unit.target: Windows PCs can be enrolled by installing the Intune client software.

trans-unit.source: The Intune client software can be installed in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: The Intune client software can be installed in the following ways:

trans-unit.source: Manually installed
trans-unit.target: Manually installed

trans-unit.source: Install using Group policy
trans-unit.target: Install using Group policy

trans-unit.source: Include in a disk image
trans-unit.target: Include in a disk image

trans-unit.source: Installed by users
trans-unit.target: Installed by users

trans-unit.source: Download Intune client software
trans-unit.target: Download Intune client software

trans-unit.source: All methods, except where users install the Intune client software themselves, require that you download the software so it can be deployed.
trans-unit.target: All methods, except where users install the Intune client software themselves, require that you download the software so it can be deployed.

trans-unit.source: In the [Microsoft Intune administration console](https://manage.microsoft.com/), click **Admin** > **Client Software Download**
trans-unit.target: In the [Microsoft Intune administration console](https://manage.microsoft.com/), click **Admin** > **Client Software Download**

trans-unit.source: Download the Intune PC client
trans-unit.target: Download the Intune PC client

trans-unit.source: On the **Client Software Download** page, click **Download Client Software** and save the **Microsoft_Intune_Setup.zip** package containing the software to a secure location on your network.
trans-unit.target: On the **Client Software Download** page, click **Download Client Software** and save the **Microsoft_Intune_Setup.zip** package containing the software to a secure location on your network.

trans-unit.source: The Intune client software installation package contains information about your account.
trans-unit.target: The Intune client software installation package contains information about your account.

trans-unit.source: If unauthorized users gain access to the installation package, they can enroll computers to the account that is represented by its embedded certificate.
trans-unit.target: If unauthorized users gain access to the installation package, they can enroll computers to the account that is represented by its embedded certificate.

trans-unit.source: Extract the contents of the installation package to the secure location on your network.
trans-unit.target: Extract the contents of the installation package to the secure location on your network.

trans-unit.source: Do not rename or remove the **ACCOUNTCERT** file that is extracted or the client software installation will fail.
trans-unit.target: Do not rename or remove the **ACCOUNTCERT** file that is extracted or the client software installation will fail.

trans-unit.source: Manually deploy
trans-unit.target: Manually deploy

trans-unit.source: On a computer, browse to the folder where the client software installation files are located, and then run **Microsoft_Intune_Setup.exe** to install the client software.
trans-unit.target: On a computer, browse to the folder where the client software installation files are located, and then run **Microsoft_Intune_Setup.exe** to install the client software.

trans-unit.source: The status of the installation is displayed when you hover over the icon in the taskbar on the client computer.
trans-unit.target: The status of the installation is displayed when you hover over the icon in the taskbar on the client computer.

trans-unit.source: Deploy with using Group Policy
trans-unit.target: Deploy with using Group Policy

trans-unit.source: In the folder that contains the files **Microsoft_Intune_Setup.exe** and **MicrosoftIntune.accountcert**, run the following command to extract the Windows Installer-based installation programs for 32-bit and 64-bit computers:
trans-unit.target: In the folder that contains the files **Microsoft_Intune_Setup.exe** and **MicrosoftIntune.accountcert**, run the following command to extract the Windows Installer-based installation programs for 32-bit and 64-bit computers:

trans-unit.source: Copy the **Microsoft_Intune_x86.msi** file, the **Microsoft_Intune_x64.msi** file, and the **MicrosoftIntune.accountcert** file to a network location that can be accessed by all computers to which the client software is to be installed.
trans-unit.target: Copy the **Microsoft_Intune_x86.msi** file, the **Microsoft_Intune_x64.msi** file, and the **MicrosoftIntune.accountcert** file to a network location that can be accessed by all computers to which the client software is to be installed.

trans-unit.source: Do not separate or rename the files or the client software installation will fail.
trans-unit.target: Do not separate or rename the files or the client software installation will fail.

trans-unit.source: Use Group Policy to deploy the software to computers on your network.
trans-unit.target: Use Group Policy to deploy the software to computers on your network.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to use Group Policy to automatically deploy software, see your Windows Server documentation.
trans-unit.target: For more information about how to use Group Policy to automatically deploy software, see your Windows Server documentation.

trans-unit.source: Install as part of an image
trans-unit.target: Install as part of an image

trans-unit.source: You can deploy the Intune client software to computers as part of an operating system image by using the following example procedure as a basis:
trans-unit.target: You can deploy the Intune client software to computers as part of an operating system image by using the following example procedure as a basis:

trans-unit.source: Copy the client installation files, **Microsoft_Intune_Setup.exe** and **MicrosoftIntune.accountcert** to the **%Systemdrive%\Temp\Microsoft_Intune_Setup** folder on the reference computer.
trans-unit.target: Copy the client installation files, **Microsoft_Intune_Setup.exe** and **MicrosoftIntune.accountcert** to the **%Systemdrive%\Temp\Microsoft_Intune_Setup** folder on the reference computer.

trans-unit.source: Create the **WindowsIntuneEnrollPending** registry entry by adding the following command to the **SetupComplete.cmd** script:
trans-unit.target: Create the **WindowsIntuneEnrollPending** registry entry by adding the following command to the **SetupComplete.cmd** script:

trans-unit.source: Add the following command to **setupcomplete.cmd** to run the enrollment package with the /PrepareEnroll command-line argument:
trans-unit.target: Add the following command to **setupcomplete.cmd** to run the enrollment package with the /PrepareEnroll command-line argument:

trans-unit.source: The **SetupComplete.cmd** script enables Windows Setup to make modifications to the system before a user logs on.
trans-unit.target: The **SetupComplete.cmd** script enables Windows Setup to make modifications to the system before a user logs on.

trans-unit.source: The **/PrepareEnroll** command-line argument prepares a targeted computer to be automatically enrolled in Intune after Windows Setup finishes.
trans-unit.target: The **/PrepareEnroll** command-line argument prepares a targeted computer to be automatically enrolled in Intune after Windows Setup finishes.

trans-unit.source: Put **SetupComplete.cmd** in the **%Windir%\Setup\Scripts** folder on the reference computer.
trans-unit.target: Put **SetupComplete.cmd** in the **%Windir%\Setup\Scripts** folder on the reference computer.

trans-unit.source: Capture an image of the reference computer and then deploy this to targeted computers.
trans-unit.target: Capture an image of the reference computer and then deploy this to targeted computers.

trans-unit.source: When the targeted computer restarts at the completion of Windows Setup, the **WindowsIntuneEnrollPending** registry key is created.
trans-unit.target: When the targeted computer restarts at the completion of Windows Setup, the **WindowsIntuneEnrollPending** registry key is created.

trans-unit.source: The enrollment package checks whether the computer is enrolled.
trans-unit.target: The enrollment package checks whether the computer is enrolled.

trans-unit.source: If the computer is enrolled, no further action is taken.
trans-unit.target: If the computer is enrolled, no further action is taken.

trans-unit.source: If the computer is not enrolled, the enrollment package creates a Microsoft Intune Automatic Enrollment Task.
trans-unit.target: If the computer is not enrolled, the enrollment package creates a Microsoft Intune Automatic Enrollment Task.

trans-unit.source: When the automatic enrollment task runs at the next scheduled time, it checks the existence of the **WindowsIntuneEnrollPending** registry value, and it tries to enroll the targeted PC in Intune.
trans-unit.target: When the automatic enrollment task runs at the next scheduled time, it checks the existence of the **WindowsIntuneEnrollPending** registry value, and it tries to enroll the targeted PC in Intune.

trans-unit.source: If the enrollment fails for any reason, the enrollment is retried the next time the task runs.
trans-unit.target: If the enrollment fails for any reason, the enrollment is retried the next time the task runs.

trans-unit.source: The retries continue for a period of one month.
trans-unit.target: The retries continue for a period of one month.

trans-unit.source: The Intune Automatic Enrollment Task, the **WindowsIntuneEnrollPending** registry value, and the account certificate are deleted from the targeted computer when the enrollment is successful or after one month.
trans-unit.target: The Intune Automatic Enrollment Task, the **WindowsIntuneEnrollPending** registry value, and the account certificate are deleted from the targeted computer when the enrollment is successful or after one month.

trans-unit.source: Instruct user to self-enroll
trans-unit.target: Instruct user to self-enroll

trans-unit.source: Users can install the Intune client software by browsing to [http://portal.manage.microsoft.com](http://portal..manage.microsoft.com).
trans-unit.target: Users can install the Intune client software by browsing to [http://portal.manage.microsoft.com](http://portal..manage.microsoft.com).

trans-unit.source: If the web portal can detect the device is a Windows PC, it will prompted to enroll PC by downloading the Intune software client.
trans-unit.target: If the web portal can detect the device is a Windows PC, it will prompted to enroll PC by downloading the Intune software client.

trans-unit.source: Once downloaded, users can install the software to bring their PCs into management.
trans-unit.target: Once downloaded, users can install the software to bring their PCs into management.

trans-unit.source: Intune Portal prompting to download the Intune software client
trans-unit.target: Intune Portal prompting to download the Intune software client

trans-unit.source: Monitor and validate successful client deployment
trans-unit.target: Monitor and validate successful client deployment

trans-unit.source: Use one of the following procedures to help you monitor and validate successful client deployment.
trans-unit.target: Use one of the following procedures to help you monitor and validate successful client deployment.

trans-unit.source: To verify the installation of the client software from the Microsoft Intune administrator console
trans-unit.target: To verify the installation of the client software from the Microsoft Intune administrator console

trans-unit.source: In the [Microsoft Intune administration console](https://manage.microsoft.com/), click **Groups** > **All Devices** > **All Computers**.
trans-unit.target: In the [Microsoft Intune administration console](https://manage.microsoft.com/), click **Groups** > **All Devices** > **All Computers**.

trans-unit.source: Scroll down the list of computers to find managed computers that are communicating with Intune, or to search for a specific managed computer by typing the computer name, or any part of the name, in the **Search devices** box.
trans-unit.target: Scroll down the list of computers to find managed computers that are communicating with Intune, or to search for a specific managed computer by typing the computer name, or any part of the name, in the **Search devices** box.

trans-unit.source: Examine the status of the computer in the bottom pane of the console, and resolve any errors.
trans-unit.target: Examine the status of the computer in the bottom pane of the console, and resolve any errors.

trans-unit.source: To create a computer inventory report to display all enrolled computers
trans-unit.target: To create a computer inventory report to display all enrolled computers

trans-unit.source: In the [Microsoft Intune administration console](https://manage.microsoft.com/), click **Reports** > **Computer Inventory Reports**.
trans-unit.target: In the [Microsoft Intune administration console](https://manage.microsoft.com/), click **Reports** > **Computer Inventory Reports**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Create New Report** page, leave all fields as the default values (unless you want to apply filters), and click **View Report**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Create New Report** page, leave all fields as the default values (unless you want to apply filters), and click **View Report**.

trans-unit.source: The **Computer Inventory Report** page opens in a new window that displays all computers that are successfully enrolled in Intune.
trans-unit.target: The **Computer Inventory Report** page opens in a new window that displays all computers that are successfully enrolled in Intune.

trans-unit.source: Click any column heading in the report to sort the list by the contents of that column.
trans-unit.target: Click any column heading in the report to sort the list by the contents of that column.

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: See Also
